func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given the lengths of its sides using Heron's formula.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

semiperimeter.description: Semi-perimeter of the triangle, calculated as (a + b + c) / 2.

func_sig.description: Calculate the ratio between any two given numbers.
func_sig.name: calculate_ratio

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_triangle_area

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the painted area of a cone with given dimensions and ratios for a smaller cone and frustum.
func_sig.name: calculate_painted_area

cone_height.description: The height of the original cone.

cone_radius.description: The radius of the original cone.

small_cone_height_ratio.description: The ratio of the height of the smaller cone to the height of the original cone.

func_sig.description: Calculate the distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance

point1.description: Coordinates of the first point (x1, y1, z1).

point2.description: Coordinates of the second point (x2, y2, z2).

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its edge length.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of one edge of the cube.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a cone given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a cone given its radius and slant height.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the cone's base.

slant_height.description: The slant height of the cone.
